about_the_game:
Lost Horizon: Sky Relics invites you into a breathtaking world of floating realms shattered by ancient calamity. As the chosen hero, you must journey across diverse and culturally inspired lands to recover four legendary relics and restore balance before the final collapse of this mystical world.

Awaken on the isolated island of Lunethra, where your adventure begins. Guided by a radiant fairy, you’ll master movement and platforming, unlock elemental abilities, and face cunning enemies. Traverse lush forests, vast deserts, and frozen Viking landscapes—all while solving intricate puzzles and uncovering secrets hidden within sky dungeons.

From tranquil villages like Aeryndale to perilous floating platforms of Thalora Drift, every step challenges your courage and wit. Engage in dynamic ranged combat, navigate traps, and unlock magical powers as you battle fearsome bosses and unravel the mystery of the Shattered Realms.

Features

🌟 An Expansive Floating World
Explore vibrant islands suspended in the sky, each showcasing unique cultures, themes, and landscapes—from medieval fortresses to Eastern-inspired temples.

🔥 Master Elemental Abilities
Unlock powerful magic, like fireballs and water-based spells, to solve puzzles, overcome obstacles, and defeat enemies.

🧩 Engaging Puzzles and Platforming
Test your problem-solving skills with cleverly designed puzzles and platforming challenges that evolve as you progress.

⚔️ Strategic Combat
Utilize precise ranged attacks to defeat foes, from swarming goblins to towering elemental bosses.

🏰 Sky Dungeons
Delve into intricate dungeons filled with traps, guardians, and legendary relics to progress your journey.

🎭 Character Customization
Personalize your hero’s appearance with options for gender, hairstyles, and costumes.

🚀 Dynamic Storytelling
Uncover the rich lore of the Lost Horizon, interact with memorable NPCs, and shape your path toward saving the realms.

Embark on a spellbinding adventure to reclaim the Lost Horizon and unite the fractured realms. Will you restore balance or watch the skies fall into chaos?

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD A6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 4GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD A8
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 8GB
